author: Staff Reporter
Karthik Madhavan
text:
The School of Distance Education of Bharathiar University has released the results of the UG/PG/MCA/MBA/executive MBA/B.Ed./M.Ed./P.G. Diploma and diploma courses it held in December 2015. A release says that the results are available on the university’s website, which could be accessed by entering register number.

The application form for revaluation and re-total is available on the website. The last date for submitting the application is March 8.

The examination for all UG/PG/MCA/MBA/executive MBA/B.Ed./M.Ed./P.G. Diploma and diploma courses offered by the SDE will start on May 10. Application form for the examinations too is available online.
title: BU results
